Description.div:
ShipmentNo, ShipNode and SellerOrganizationCode form the unique key for a Shipment. If the ShipmentNo attribute is passed as blanks, then system generates a new ShipmentNo.
In the scenario when one or more shipment lines with different information passed to the API, the order release information from the first available ShipmentLine will be used to derive the Shipment header attributes.
Shipment has more than one provided service line.
Shipment contains product lines belonging to multiple delivery service lines.
Both ShipNode and ReceivingNode are blank.
Both ReceivingNode and ToAddressKey are blank.
Both ShipNode and FromAddressKey are blank.
ShipNode is blank and invalid FromAddressKey.
Shipment is for single order.

Buyer organization to which this shipment belongs. If an OrderRelease entity is not passed, the following attributes must be passed: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode.
If the value is passed as Y , then the shipment is created and confirmed.
When DoNotMixEnterprisesInLoad is set to Y and rule ALLOW_ADDITION_OF_SHIPMENT_NA_YANTRA_TO_LOAD is enabled, system will NOT mix shipments belonging to different enterprises in a load.

Indicates a classification of data on which a particular set of business processes must be applied. If an OrderRelease entity is not passed, the following attributes must be passed: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode.

Enterprise to which this shipment belongs. If an OrderRelease entity is not passed, the following attributes must be passed: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode.

Determines whether the shipment is a single order shipment or a shipment with multiple order. This flag may be used to create a dummy shipment with no shipment lines against an order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
When the flag is set to Y
- Shipment\OrderNo or Shipment\OrderReleases\OrderReleaseOrderHeaderKey must be passed.
- the values passed in the Order attributes are used to fill void attributes of the Shipment.
- the Order attributes should match those of the Shipment.
When the flag is passed as N :
- This shipment is treated as multi order shipment, therefore ReleaseNo and OrderNo will not be set on the shipment header.
If Shipment\OrderNo or Shipment\OrderReleases\OrderReleaseOrderHeaderKey is passed, regardless of the user input the IsSingleOrder flag is stamped as Y automatically. In this case the order information will be set on the shipment and the user must ensure that the order details on the shipment header and shipment lines are the same.

Indicates if order is available on the system.
Default: Y
Valid Values: Y , N or M
If passed as N Order,OrderLine and OrderRelease validations are not done. Further defaulitng of shipment attributes from Order,OrderLine and OrderRelease are not done.
If passed as M Order,OrderLine and OrderRelease validations and defaulting of attributes from Order, OrderLine and OrderRelease are done only if order is available on system.

Node to which the shipment should be made. If an OrderRelease is not passed, the following attributes must be passed: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode. If OrderRelease is for Return Order and ReceivingNode is blank then it is defaulted to OrderRelease's ShipNode else it is defaulted to OrderRelease's ReceivingNode.
Invalid ReceivingNode is passed.

Ship node from where shipment was made. If an OrderRelease is not passed, the following attributes must be passed: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode. If OrderRelease is for Return Order and ShipNode is blank then it is defaulted to OrderRelease's ReceivingNode else it is defaulted to OrderRelease's ShipNode.
Invalid ShipNode is passed.
Part of the information that identifies a Shipment. If passed as blanks, then the system generates a new ShipmentNo.

Address information for where the shipment should be shipped. If ToAddress is not passed, the values are defaulted from the ReceivingNode or ShipNode. If ReceivingNode is not passed, or there are no default values, ToAddress must be passed.
The billing address of the shipment.

Address information for source of the shipment. If FromAddress is not passed, the values are defaulted from the buyer or seller organization. If ShipNode is not passed, or there are no default values, FromAddress must be passed.

Stores additional information related to tag number, serial number, ship by date for a shipment line or container detail. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory or the Buyer mandates tag information.

Ship advice number of the order release. ShipAdviceNo will only be used when order release identifiers such as OrderReleaseKey or ReleaseNo and OrderHeaderKey are not provided. ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided) will be used to determine the order release in the system. If more than one order releases are found in the system with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided), the order release with a pickable status will be used.
More than one order releases in a pickable status are found with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).
System cannot find an order release with the provided ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).

Attribute.Name: Tranname
Attribute.Description: Specifies the name of the Transaction

Description.div:
OrderRelease information is passed and OrderAvailableOnSystem is N .
If an OrderRelease is not passed, the following attributes must be passed in the Shipment entity: DocumentType, EnterpriseCode, BuyerOrganizationCode, SellerOrganizationCode, and either ShipNode or ReceivingNode.

Ship advice number of the order release. ShipAdviceNo will only be used when order release identifiers such as OrderReleaseKey or ReleaseNo and OrderHeaderKey are not provided. ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided) will be used to determine the order release in the system. If more than one order releases are found in the system with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided), the order release with a pickable status will be used.
More than one order releases in a pickable status are found with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).
System cannot find an order release with the provided ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).

Stores information about the ShipmentLine. To modify an existing ShipmentLine, identify the ShipmentLine by passing either the ShipmentLineKey or the ShipmentKey, ShipmentLineNo and ShipmentSubLineNo or the ShipmentKey, {OrderNo, ReleaseNo}/{ShipAdviceNo}, PrimeLineNo, SubLineNo, ItemID, UnitOfMeasure and tag attributes if any under ShipmentLineInvAttRequest element.
If given under ContainerDetail element, identify the ShipmentLine by passing either the ShipmentLineKey or the ShipmentKey, ShipmentLineNo and ShipmentSubLineNo.

The number of components required for one kit. The quantity is used only for bundle components only when the order is not available for the shipment line. When order is available for the shipment line, KitQty is defaulted from order information.

Ship advice number of the order release. ShipAdviceNo will only be used when order release identifiers such as OrderReleaseKey or ReleaseNo and OrderHeaderKey are not provided. ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided) will be used to determine the order release in the system. If more than one order releases are found in the system with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided), the order release with a pickable status will be used.
More than one order releases in a pickable status are found with the same ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).
System cannot find an order release with the provided ShipAdviceNo and ShipNode (if provided).

Identifies the bundle parent shipment line for this line. This element will be considered only when order is not available on system for the shipment. When order is available on system the hierarchy of the bundle is obtained from order information.
When order is not available on system and bundle item is passed without any components, then the bundle components will be defaulted from catalog.
When the passed shipment line attributes fails to identify a bundle shipment line.
When bundle components are not passed or present for the bundle parent item.
Shipment Line key of the bundle parent line. Alternatively ShipmentLineNo can be passed.
Shipment Line number of the bundle parent line. Alternatively ShipmentLineKey can be passed.

Additional information related to tag number, serial number, ship by date for a shipment line or container detail is stored in this table. If the shipment line item is tagged, ShipmentTagSerial has to be specified to confirm the shipment. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory or the Buyer mandates tag information.
When sum of tagged quantity of the line and containerized quantity is greater than ShipmentLine quantity.
When total tagged quantity for the Container detail is greater than Container detail quantity .
When tag details are not given for a shipment line with item as tag controlled.

Serial number.
If RequestedSerialNo in ShipmentLine is not void and does not equal SerialNo.
If SerialNo is provided and Quantity is not equal to one.

Element.Description: Should be specified only when Order does not exist on system.

Description.div:
Indicates the action that can be perfomed on the Special Service associated with the shipment.
Default: Create-Modify
Valid values: Create, Delete
Action is Create and OrderAvailableOnSystem flag is Y
If SpecialService is getting modified.

Error.Description: Special service code does not exist.

Description.div: When this is passed for Shipments where OrderAvailableOnSystem=N or OrderAvailableOnSystem=M, it will be used to internally invoke the recordInvoiceCreation API to create a Pro Forma Invoice. This is not applicable for Shipments where OrderAvailableOnSystem=Y and will be ignored.

Contains data related to an order invoice line.
OrderLineKey must be passed and must be valid.
Quantity being invoiced.
UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.
Optional. Stores hold type information. Multiple HoldTypes can be applied/ removed for a single shipment.

The code identifying the hold type to be applied/ removed for a Shipment.
HoldType must be defined in the configuration
